title: Twelfth night: an introduction
creator_credit: John Seabourne, Seabourne Enterprises, Anvil Film and Recording Group, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Peter Seabourne
brief_description: Shows extracts from various scenes of Shakespeare’s “Twelfth night” accompanied by Sir Tyrone Guthrie discussing the production of the play and the problems presented by scenery.
